arti_base_en: Increases Defense and Effectiveness of all allies by 5%. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

arti_desc_en: Arky heard that at the end of the year if you wear a red hat with white fur, you should give out presents to make people happy! Since Arky's such a generous Guardian, I will give Master a cookie! Just for today!
arti_max_kr: 전투 시작 시 아군 전체의 생명력을 10% 회복시킵니다. 회복량은 대상의 최대 생명력에 비례해 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 레벨업 시 효과가 증가하지 않습니다.
arti_base_kr: 전투 시작 시 아군 전체의 생명력을 10% 회복시킵니다. 회복량은 대상의 최대 생명력에 비례해 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 레벨업 시 효과가 증가하지 않습니다.
arti_base_en: Recovers Health of all allies by 10% at the start of the battle. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

arti_desc_en: The most vulnerable point on a Dragon's body is protected by their toughest scales. An accurate shot can kill a Dragon in an instant, but if you miss, their wrath will ensure you do not live long enough to regret it.
arti_max_kr:
치명 확률이 15% 증가합니다.
자신의 턴에 추가 공격 후 행동 게이지가 20% 증가합니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 15%. After activating an extra attack on the caster's turn, increases Combat Readiness by 20%.

치명 확률이 15% 증가합니다.
자신의 턴에 추가 공격 후 행동 게이지가 10% 증가합니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 15%. After activating an extra attack on the caster's turn, increases Combat Readiness by 10%.

arti_desc_en: This blade's name is derived from the brutal scar it leaves behind, which makes it appear as though the victim's skin was torn by the bite of a giant beast. In order to effectively control the blade, a strength that goes beyond the realm of Humans is needed.
arti_max_kr: 단일 공격 시 피해량이 16% 증가합니다. 단일 공격으로 적 처치 시 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 행동 게이지를 12% 증가시킵니다.
arti_max_en: When using a Single Attack, increases damage dealt by 16%. When defeating an enemy with a Single Attack, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 12%.
arti_base_kr: 단일 공격 시 피해량이 8% 증가합니다. 단일 공격으로 적 처치 시 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 행동 게이지를 6% 증가시킵니다.
arti_base_en: When using a Single Attack, increases damage dealt by 8%. When defeating an enemy with a Single Attack, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 6%.

arti_desc_en: "According to my mother, this necklace holds a wolf's power. That's why it shines brighter on nights you can see the moon clearly. It means the wolf will soon begin its relentless chase."
arti_max_kr: 아군이 공격 시 치명타가 발생했다면 치명타 발생 횟수만큼 자신의 공격력이 4% 증가합니다. 해당 효과는 최대 8회 중첩됩니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Attack by 12%. Increases Attack of the caster by 4% when an ally makes a critical hit. Effect can only stack up to 6 times.
arti_base_kr: 아군이 공격 시 치명타가 발생했다면 치명타 발생 횟수만큼 자신의 공격력이 2% 증가합니다. 해당 효과는 최대 12회 중첩됩니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Attack by 6%. Increases Attack of the caster by 2% when an ally makes a critical hit. Effect can only stack up to 6 times.

arti_desc_en: A dessert made for the festival by a famous chef using special golden cocoa beans that can only be found in the forests near Perland. It is famous for its sweet flavor compared to normal cocoa.

arti_desc_en: The bright star shining within the dark crystal resembles the North Star, and is determined to guide people through chaotic times.
arti_max_kr: 전투 시작 시 1턴 간 은신이 발생합니다. 자신의 턴 종료 시 70% 확률로 2턴 간 은신이 발생합니다. 턴 종료 시 은신 효과는 2턴에 1번만 발생합니다.
arti_max_en: At the start of battle, grants stealth for 1 turn. At the end of the caster's turn, has a 70% chance to grant stealth for 2 turns. Stealth granted at the end of the caster's turn can be activated once every 2 turns.

arti_desc_en: A flag symbolizes the authority and honor of its unit. Therefore, it is bestowed among the most trustworthy person. I present to you this flag, with faith that you will be the beacon of hope within our path to victory.
arti_max_kr: 공격 시 자신이 유리한 상성이라면 피해량이 16% 증가합니다. 피격 시 자신이 유리한 상성이라면 받는 피해량이 16% 감소합니다. 피해감소는 중복 시 가장 높은 효과만 적용됩니다. 해당 아티팩트는 화염, 냉기, 자연 속성에만 적용되며, 파티 내 한 명만 적용됩니다.
arti_max_en: If the caster is at an elemental advantage when attacking, damage dealt increases by 16%. If the caster is at an elemental advantage when being attacked, damage taken decreases by 16%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The effect of this Artifact applies only to Earth, Ice, and Fire elemental Heroes, and can only be applied to one Hero within a team.

When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. arti_desc_en: A glove made to maximize an enhanced mage's magic. It draws out limitless power so that one may fight against many. However, because it was made without consideration of the harmful effects it may have upon the wearer, the wearer suffers from terrible side effects.

arti_max_en: The caster's Critical Hit Chance and Critical Hit Damage increase by 24% at the start of battle. Effect decreases by 1.2% every time the caster attacks, down to 18%.

arti_desc_en: An artifact handed down by the god Rekos after the Spirit Shrine was built. It is said that this item, containing the power of a god, is bestowed upon the most qualified shaman.

arti_desc_en: A song written by Tamarinne, dedicated to those who fought courageously to keep the Orbis safe. Karin was in charge of the chorus and cheoreography, and Arky joins Tamarinne to perform the song as a duet.

arti_desc_en: "They say Humans do not require meaning to exist; therefore, they are capable of becoming free. Does that mean a being born with a specific purpose can never be free?"

arti_desc_en: Sez's arm was modified and weaponized as part of an experiment in the past. After he escaped the facility, it grew more and more powerful until he could no longer control it. Sez considered this power a curse and used clothes and gloves to conceal his arm. After coming to realize this, the members of the Phantom CIC made him a special glove to help him control its power.

arti_max_kr:
방어력이 10% 증가합니다.
턴 종료 시 자신을 제외한 생명력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군에게 2턴간 자신의 최대 생명력의 16%만큼 보호막을 발생시킵니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한명만 적용됩니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Defense of all allies by 10%. At the end of the turn, grants a barrier equivalent to 16% of the caster's max Health for 2 turns to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a turn.
arti_base_kr:
방어력이 10% 증가합니다.
턴 종료 시 자신을 제외한 생명력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군에게 2턴간 자신의 최대 생명력의 8%만큼 보호막을 발생시킵니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한명만 적용됩니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Defense of all allies by 10%. At the end of the turn, grants a barrier equivalent to 8% of the caster's max Health for 2 turns to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a turn.

arti_desc_en: In the national swordsmanship tournament held to appoint an elite knight to protect the first in line to the throne of Lefundos, the winner, crowned with laurel wreath, was neither the son of a noble family nor a veteran knight but an ordinary young man, not even twenty years of age.
arti_max_kr:
방어력이 16% 증가합니다.
전체공격 피격시 적의 소울을 5개 제거합니다.
arti_max_en: When an ally suffers an attack that targets all allies, decreases damage suffered by 20%, and removes 5 Soul from the enemy. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied, and Soul removal effect can only be activated once per skill.
arti_base_kr:
방어력이 8% 증가합니다.
전체공격 피격시 적의 소울을 5개 제거합니다.
arti_base_en: When an ally suffers an attack that targets all allies, decreases damage suffered by 10%, and removes 5 Soul from the enemy. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied, and Soul removal effect can only be activated once per skill.

arti_desc_en: "With this...will I grow stronger?" Old prayer beads of unknown origin passed down since long ago. It is said that depending on the nature of the wearer, it can grant partial control of natural power.
arti_max_kr: 단일 공격 시 피해량이 10% 증가합니다. 단일 공격 피격 시 받는 피해량이 16% 감소합니다. 피해 감소 효과는 중복 시 가장 높은 효과만 적용됩니다.
arti_max_en: When attacking with a Single Attack, increases damage dealt by 10%. When attacked by a Single Attack, decreases damage suffered by 16%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
arti_base_kr: 단일 공격 시 피해량이 10% 증가합니다. 단일 공격 피격 시 받는 피해량이 8% 감소합니다. 피해 감소 효과는 중복 시 가장 높은 효과만 적용됩니다.
arti_base_en: When attacking with a Single Attack, increases damage dealt by 10%. When attacked by a Single Attack, decreases damage suffered by 8%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

arti_desc_en: An enormous crown that Chloe carries with her for the moment when she becomes a true queen. She aspires to become a queen whose power is as impressive and glamorous as the crown itself. As for where and how she found it... That's Chloe's secret!
arti_max_kr: 단일 공격 시 피해량이 16% 증가하고 대상이 보호막 상태라면 피해량이 추가로 16% 증가합니다.
arti_max_en: Increases damage by 16% when the caster attacks with a Single Attack and increases damage by an additional 16% if the enemy is granted a barrier.
arti_base_kr: 단일 공격 시 피해량이 8% 증가하고 대상이 보호막 상태라면 피해량이 추가로 8% 증가합니다.
arti_base_en: Increases damage by 8% when the caster attacks with a Single Attack and increases damage by an additional 8% if the enemy is granted a barrier.

arti_desc_en: It's hard to even venture a guess as to when this red marble was created. This marble creates the illusion that an immense full moon has risen in the sky, bringing forth the deep madness hidden within any who see it and trapping them in a never-ending hallucination.
arti_max_kr: 협공확률이 14% 증가합니다. 자신의 턴이 아니라면 효과적중이 40% 증가합니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Dual Attack chance by 14%. When it is not the caster's turn, increases Effectiveness by 40%.
arti_base_kr: 협공확률이 7% 증가합니다. 자신의 턴이 아니라면 효과적중이 20% 증가합니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Dual Attack chance by 7%. When it is not the caster's turn, increases Effectiveness by 20%.

arti_desc_en: A device that can restrict access to certain districts under the authority of the police. Unless granted access from the authorities, no one can enter.
arti_max_kr:
턴 시작시 적 전체의 강화 효과수 x 8%의 확률로 자신에게 1턴간 공격력증가 (대)를 발생시킵니다.
전체 공격후 자신의 행동게이지가 10% 증가합니다. 추가 공격, 반격, 협공시에는 발동하지 않습니다.
arti_max_en: At the start of the turn, for each buff granted to an enemy, has a 10% chance to grant the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 1 turn. At the end of the turn, grants a barrier equal to 50% of the caster's Attack for  1 turn.
arti_base_kr:
턴 시작시 적 전체의 강화 효과수 x 4%의 확률로 자신에게 1턴간 공격력증가 (대)를 발생시킵니다.
전체 공격후 자신의 행동게이지가 10% 증가합니다. 추가 공격, 반격, 협공시에는 발동하지 않습니다.
arti_base_en: At the start of the turn, for each buff granted to an enemy, has a 5% chance to grant the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 1 turn. At the end of the turn, grants a barrier equal to 25% of the caster's Attack for  1 turn.

arti_desc_en: "You finally found what you wanted, my lady." "Stop imposing on me, you fool." Oblivious to the events that would soon unfold before them, Baal smiled to himself when Sezan found the spell for the forbidden magic ceremony.
arti_max_kr: 전체 공격 시 피해량이 14% 증가하고, 20% 확률로 스킬 쿨타임 1턴 감소가 발생합니다.
arti_max_en: When using an attack that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt by 14%, with a 20% chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn.
arti_base_kr: 전체 공격 시 피해량이 7% 증가하고, 10% 확률로 스킬 쿨타임 1턴 감소가 발생합니다.
arti_base_en: When using an attack that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt by 7%, with a 10% chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn.

arti_desc_en: "To those fools who cannot be redeemed: kneel down, despair, and obey." Those who fell to his sword soon lost themselves and rose up as Dust Walkers.
arti_max_kr:
회피가 20% 증가합니다.
공격 시 피해량이 12% 증가하고 생명력 상황이 나빠질수록 피해량이 증가합니다. 최대 24%까지 증가합니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Evasion by 20%. Damage dealt increases by 12% when attacking, and as Health decreases, damage dealt increases, up to a maximum of 24%.
arti_base_kr:
회피가 20% 증가합니다.
공격 시 피해량이 6% 증가하고 생명력 상황이 나빠질수록 피해량이 증가합니다. 최대 12%까지 증가합니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Evasion by 20%. Damage dealt increases by 6% when attacking, and as Health decreases, damage dealt increases, up to a maximum of 12%.

arti_desc_en: Ras and the Heirs have been invited to a banquet in celebration of Ezeran Foundation Day. As they leave the hardships they suffered behind them, they raise their glasses in anticipation of a new, peaceful world.
arti_max_kr: 파티에 편셩된 영웅들의 획득 경험치가 15% 증가합니다. 아티팩트로 인한 경험치 증가 효과는 중복 시 가장 높은 효과만 적용되며, 서포터로 사용 시에는 적용되지 않습니다. 해당 아티팩트는 레벨업 시 효과가 증가하지 않습니다.
arti_max_en: Increases the EXP acquired by Heroes in the team by 15%. When more than one Artifact that increases EXP is equipped, only the strongest effect is applied, and this effect will not be applied when used via a Supporter. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.
arti_base_kr: 파티에 편셩된 영웅들의 획득 경험치가 15% 증가합니다. 아티팩트로 인한 경험치 증가 효과는 중복 시 가장 높은 효과만 적용되며, 서포터로 사용 시에는 적용되지 않습니다. 해당 아티팩트는 레벨업 시 효과가 증가하지 않습니다.
arti_base_en: Increases the EXP acquired by Heroes in the team by 15%. When more than one Artifact that increases EXP is equipped, only the strongest effect is applied, and this effect will not be applied when used via a Supporter. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

arti_desc_en: Magical ore that the Emporium specially refines and distributes every year for the Moonlight Reception. People pray for peace in the next year as they gaze at the moonlight stored inside the ore.
arti_max_kr: 아군 전체의 방어력, 효과저항을 5% 증가시킵니다. 동일한 이름의 아티팩트 효과와 중복되지 않습니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Defense and Effect Resistance of all allies by 5%. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.
arti_base_kr: 아군 전체의 방어력, 효과저항을 2.5% 증가시킵니다. 동일한 이름의 아티팩트 효과와 중복되지 않습니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Defense and Effect Resistance of all allies by 2.5%. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

arti_desc_en: A boy with a scythe crossed the threshold of life and death a number of times, and with each crisis he faced, he was reborn with a stronger desire to live. His red scythe symbolizes endings transforming into new beginnings and old blood transforming into new strength.
arti_max_kr: 단일 공격 후 15% 확률로 턴 종료 시 대상에게 걸린 출혈, 화상을 격폭시킵니다.
arti_max_en: After attacking with a Single Attack, has a 15% chance to detonate any bleeding and burn effects inflicted on the target at the end of the turn.
arti_base_kr: 단일 공격 후 7.5% 확률로 턴 종료 시 대상에게 걸린 출혈, 화상을 격폭시킵니다.
arti_base_en: After attacking with a Single Attack, has a 7.5% chance to detonate any bleeding and burn effects inflicted on the target at the end of the turn.

arti_desc_en: After suffering the pain of deceit and betrayal, the pillars of her heart collapsed, and as she escaped the prison of passion, she embraced the freedom of destruction. However, her greed is building a new tower that will imprison her once more.
arti_max_kr: 공격 후 대상에게 100의 고정 피해를 발생시킵니다.
arti_max_en: Deals 100 fixed damage to the target after attacking.
arti_base_kr: 공격 후 대상에게 50의 고정 피해를 발생시킵니다.
arti_base_en: Deals 50 fixed damage to the target after attacking.

arti_desc_en: A girl with a large marble creates nightmares as she dances in the moonlight. These malicious illusions that blur the lines of purity and evil are actually a desperate attempt to bury the scars hidden deep within her subconscious. The whole world may know, but you might not.
arti_max_kr: 단일 공격 후 15% 확률로 대상의 강화효과를 1개 훔칩니다.
arti_max_en: After attacking with a Single Attack, has a 15% chance to steal one buff from the target.
arti_base_kr: 단일 공격 후 7.5% 확률로 대상의 강화효과를 1개 훔칩니다.
arti_base_en: After attacking with a Single Attack, has a 7.5% chance to steal one buff from the target.

arti_desc_en: "Were the trusty sword on your shoulder to slip even slightly, it could slit your throat. The same is true of peopleâ€”the closer you keep them, the more easily they're able to harm you."
arti_max_kr: 단일 공격 후 자신의 공격력을 10% 증가시키고, 대상에게 30% 확률로 1턴간 침묵을 발생시킵니다. 공격력 증가 효과는 최대 3회 중첩됩니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Evasion by 20%. After successfully evading, has a 30% chance to counterattack.
arti_base_kr: 단일 공격 후 자신의 공격력을 5% 증가시키고, 대상에게 15% 확률로 1턴간 침묵을 발생시킵니다. 공격력 증가 효과는 최대 3회 중첩됩니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Evasion by 20%. After successfully evading, has a 15% chance to counterattack.

arti_desc_en: A sword given to Vildred by the eastern swordsman who taught him swordsmanship. It glows faintly when moonlight strikes the surface. It is known as the Summer Sword, one of the four swords crafted long, long ago.
arti_max_kr: 전체 공격 시 대상의 방어력을 20% 관통합니다. 전체 공격으로 적 처치 시 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 행동 게이지를 10% 증가시킵니다.
arti_max_en: When using a skill that targets all enemies, penetrates the target's Defense by 0%. When defeating an enemy with a skill that targets all enemies, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 10%.
arti_base_kr: 전체 공격 시 대상의 방어력을 10% 관통합니다. 전체 공격으로 적 처치 시 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 행동 게이지를 10% 증가시킵니다.
arti_base_en: When using a skill that targets all enemies, penetrates the target's Defense by 10%. When defeating an enemy with a skill that targets all enemies, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 10%.

arti_desc_en: A mobile data device created just for Flan. It supports hologram displays and allows Flan to access Politia's information network anytime, anywhere.
arti_max_kr: 공격이 아닌 스킬 사용 후 자신의 행동게이지가 20% 증가하고 소울을 10 획득합니다. 소울 획득은 1번 발동 시 추가로 발동하지 않습니다.
arti_max_en: After the caster uses a non-attack skill, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% and acquires 10 Souls. Souls can only be acquired once.
arti_base_kr: 공격이 아닌 스킬 사용 후 자신의 행동게이지가 10% 증가하고 소울을 10 획득합니다. 소울 획득은 1번 발동 시 추가로 발동하지 않습니다.
arti_base_en: After the caster uses a non-attack skill, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 10% and acquires 10 Souls. Souls can only be acquired once.

arti_desc_en: In this infinite universe, this neverending chain of connections, we were destined to be together! No matter what stands in our way, we will be the ray of hope protecting this world! Right?
arti_max_kr: 착용한 영웅이 모험, 서브스토리, 정령의 제단, 토벌, 균열 종료 시 획득하는 친밀도가 100% 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 레벨업 시 효과가 증가하지 않습니다.
arti_max_en: Increases the Friendship acquired after completing a stage in Adventure, Side Story, Spirit Altar, and Hunt by the Hero who has this Artifact equipped by 100%. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.
arti_base_kr: 착용한 영웅이 모험, 서브스토리, 정령의 제단, 토벌, 균열 종료 시 획득하는 친밀도가 100% 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 레벨업 시 효과가 증가하지 않습니다.
arti_base_en: Increases the Friendship acquired after completing a stage in Adventure, Side Story, Spirit Altar, and Hunt by the Hero who has this Artifact equipped by 100%. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

arti_desc_en: "The valor of one is not enough to earn victory for all - you must make colleagues you can trust and rely on. It is only once you are connected by your determination and have become one another's swords and shields that victory will be yours."
arti_max_kr: 공격 시 명중이 20%, 피해량이 16% 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한 명만 적용됩니다.
arti_max_en: When attacking, increases Hit Chance by 20% and damage dealt by 16%. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.
arti_base_kr: 공격 시 명중이 10%, 피해량이 8% 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한 명만 적용됩니다.
arti_base_en: When attacking, increases Hit Chance by 10% and damage dealt by 8%. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.

arti_desc_en: A magical tool that can be used to move to a golden chamber filled with rare goods and weaponry that lie sleeping. Once unlocked, the tool allows one to access to the treasure chamber from anywhere.
arti_max_kr: 공격이 아닌 스킬 사용 후 아군 전체의 스킬 쿨타임을 1턴 감소시키고 100% 확률로 자신에게 2턴 간 치명피해 증가를 발생시킵니다. 스킬 쿨타임 감소 효과는 1번 발동 시 추가로 발동하지 않습니다.
arti_max_en: After the caster uses a non-attack skill, decreases skill cooldowns of all allies by 1 turn, and has a 100% chance to increase Critical Hit Damage of the caster for 2 turns. Skill cooldown reduction effect can only be activated once.
arti_base_kr: 공격이 아닌 스킬 사용 후 아군 전체의 스킬 쿨타임을 1턴 감소시키고 50% 확률로 자신에게 2턴 간 치명피해 증가를 발생시킵니다. 스킬 쿨타임 감소 효과는 1번 발동 시 추가로 발동하지 않습니다.
arti_base_en: After the caster uses a non-attack skill, decreases skill cooldowns of all allies by 1 turn, and has a 50% chance to increase Critical Hit Damage of the caster for 2 turns. Skill cooldown reduction effect can only be activated once.

arti_desc_en: A girl with a bouncy blue skirt dashes from place to place, just like a rabbit. Where could she be going? Perhaps the answer lies within a fairy tale.
arti_max_kr: 추가 공격, 반격, 협공 후 60% 확률로 대상의 강화효과를 1개 해체하고 100% 확률로 1500의 고정 피해를 발생시킵니다.
arti_max_en: After an extra attack, counterattack, or Dual Attack, has a 60% chance to dispel one buff from the target, and a 100% chance to deal 1500 fixed damage.
arti_base_kr: 추가 공격, 반격, 협공 후 60% 확률로 대상의 강화효과를 1개 해체하고 100% 확률로 750의 고정 피해를 발생시킵니다.
arti_base_en: After an extra attack, counterattack, or Dual Attack, has a 60% chance to dispel one buff from the target, and a 100% chance to deal 750 fixed damage.

arti_desc_en: Kanna's favorite missile. She holds it in her arms every night before she switches off to sleep mode, dreaming of the day she can finally use it.
arti_max_kr: 명중이 20%, 치명피해가 30% 증가합니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Hit Chance by 20% and Critical Hit Damage by 30%.
arti_base_kr: 명중이 10%, 치명피해가 15% 증가합니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Hit Chance by 10% and Critical Hit Damage by 15%.

arti_desc_en: It is said that all those who looked into the brilliant twilight emitted by the staff drowned in a pool of light redder than blood.
arti_max_kr: 아군 전체의 치명확률을 10% 증가시키고 자신의 효과적중을 30% 증가시킵니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한 명만 적용됩니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Critical Hit Chance of all allies by up to 10%, and increases Effectiveness of the caster by 30%. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.
arti_base_kr: 아군 전체의 치명확률을 5% 증가시키고 자신의 효과적중을 15% 증가시킵니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한 명만 적용됩니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Critical Hit Chance of all allies by up to 5%, and increases Effectiveness of the caster by 15%. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.

arti_desc_en: A capsule created in preparation for the final days of Politis's home planet, Paradia. It's a cache of Paradia's heritage that includes relics of their technology, knowledge, culture and art so that their legacy can live on even if their planet disappears.
arti_max_kr: 사망에 이르는 피해를 받으면 자신을 제외한 아군 전체에게 100% 확률로 2턴 간 무작위 강화효과를 발생시킵니다. (공격력 증가(대), 방어력 증가, 회피 증가, 면역, 치명저항 증가 중 하나) 전투 당 1회만 발동합니다.
arti_max_en: Upon receiving lethal damage, has a 100% chance to grant all allies except for the caster a random buff for 2 turns (Increase Attack (Greater), Increase Defense, Increase Evasion, Immunity, or Increase Critical Hit Resistance). Can only be activated once per battle.
arti_base_kr: 사망에 이르는 피해를 받으면 자신을 제외한 아군 전체에게 50% 확률로 2턴 간 무작위 강화효과를 발생시킵니다. (공격력 증가(대), 방어력 증가, 회피 증가, 면역, 치명저항 증가 중 하나) 전투 당 1회만 발동합니다.
arti_base_en: Upon receiving lethal damage, has a 50% chance to grant all allies except for the caster a random buff for 2 turns (Increase Attack (Greater), Increase Defense, Increase Evasion, Immunity, or Increase Critical Hit Resistance). Can only be activated once per battle.

arti_desc_en: The most highly valued relic in a city that worships stars. This relic is considered to be blessed by the Guardian Star, and every year, the high priestess uses it during a special event to offer a prayer of gratitude to the Guardian Star.
arti_max_kr: 기본 스킬 사용 후 자신을 제외한 공격력이 가장 높은 아군의 생명력을 8% 회복시킵니다.
arti_max_en: After the caster uses a basic skill, recovers Health of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by 8%.
arti_base_kr: 기본 스킬 사용 후 자신을 제외한 공격력이 가장 높은 아군의 생명력을 4% 회복시킵니다.
arti_base_en: After the caster uses a basic skill, recovers Health of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by 4%.

arti_desc_en: With a stack of papers clutched to her chest, the girl buries the truth under a pile of valuable records that no one pays attention to. She silently endures as she limits her own potential.
arti_max_kr: 기본 스킬 사용 후 자신을 제외한 생명력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군에게 2턴 간 자신의 최대 생명력의 10% 만큼 보호막을 발생시킵니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한 명만 적용됩니다.
arti_max_en: After using a basic skill, grants a barrier equivalent to 10% of the caster's max Health for 2 turns to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.
arti_base_kr: 기본 스킬 사용 후 자신을 제외한 생명력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군에게 2턴 간 자신의 최대 생명력의 5% 만큼 보호막을 발생시킵니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 한 명만 적용됩니다.
arti_base_en: After using a basic skill, grants a barrier equivalent to 5% of the caster's max Health for 2 turns to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.

arti_desc_en: "The battlefield is full of frightened and terrified souls, but only defeat awaits those who fail to overcome their fears. Now, with the sound of this horn, transform those fears into courage."
arti_max_kr: 아군 전체의 공격력을 10% 증가시킵니다. 적 턴 종료 3회마다 자신의 행동 게이지가 20% 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 1명만 적용됩니다.
arti_max_en: Increases Attack of all allies by 10%. At the end of every 3 enemy turns, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%. This Artifact's skill can only apply to one Hero within a team.
arti_base_kr: 아군 전체의 공격력을 5% 증가시킵니다. 적 턴 종료 3회마다 자신의 행동 게이지가 10% 증가합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 파티 내 1명만 적용됩니다.
arti_base_en: Increases Attack of all allies by 5%. At the end of every 3 enemy turns, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 10%. This Artifact's skill can only apply to one Hero within a team.

arti_desc_en: This spear is said to have been used by a knight who reclaimed the throne and established a new kingdom. Legends say that whoever takes hold of this spear can begin a new era, and as a result, many covet the spear, but its whereabouts are currently unknown. However, there have been reports recently that a knight with silver hair wields a similar-looking spear.
arti_max_kr: 기본 스킬 사용 후 100% 확률로 대상에게 추가 피해를 발생시킵니다. 자신의 공격력에 비례해 추가 피해가 증가합니다.
arti_max_en: After using a basic skill, has a 100% chance to inflict additional damage to the target. Additional damage increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
arti_base_kr: 기본 스킬 사용 후 50% 확률로 대상에게 추가 피해를 발생시킵니다. 자신의 공격력에 비례해 추가 피해가 증가합니다.
arti_base_en: After using a basic skill, has a 50% chance to inflict additional damage to the target. Additional damage increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

arti_desc_en: It's a very heavy iron ball on a chain, but Rem wields it as though it were light as a feather.

arti_max_en: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 15%. When somebody dies, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 24%. Can be activated once per turn.

arti_desc_en: "A good commander must be aware of everything that could happen on the battlefield and make decisions accordingly. May this map help you with that difficult process so that your judgment won't be clouded by the fear of making the wrong decision."

arti_max_en: At the start of battle, has a 100% chance to grant a barrier equivalent to 30% of the caster's max Health for 2 turns. When the caster is at max Health after being attacked, increases Combat Readiness by 16%. Can only be activated once per turn.

arti_max_kr: 피격 시 치명타가 발생했다면 받는 피해량이 25% 감소합니다. 피해 감소 효과는 중복 시 가장 높은 효과만 적용됩니다. 자신의 턴이 아닐 때 아군 피격 시 15% 확률로 차원 균열을 사용합니다. 2턴에 1번만 발생합니다. 해당 아티팩트는 레벨업 시 효과가 증가하지 않습니다.
arti_max_en: (Mercedes-Exclusive) Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit by 30%. When more than one damage effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. If an ally is attacked when it's not the caster's turn, has a 15% chance to activate Dimensional Rupture. Can only be activated once every 2 turns. The skill effect of this artifact does not increase when enhanced. (Will not activate upon death)

arti_desc_en: "When it comes apparent that you're on the verge of defeat, soldiers will often become frustrated and surrender. When that time comes, take hold of this shield and save your soldiers. This shield will be a symbol that reinvigorates your troops, encouraging those who are in despair to continue to move forward toward victory."

arti_desc_en: Leaving behind the chaotic past and with peace in their time, those who survived have join forces together. With their own individual goals in mind, they strive to create an ideal world.

arti_desc_en: This rose of eternal beauty grants great magical power to the possessor.

arti_max_en: 50% chance to grant a barrier to the caster equivalent to 10% of max Health for 2 turns at the moment the caster is attacked. Can only be granted once every 2 turns.
arti_base_kr: 피격 후 50% 확률로 2턴 간 최대 생명력의 5%만큼 보호막을 발생시킵니다. 2턴에 1번 발생합니다.
arti_base_en: 50% chance to grant a barrier to the caster equivalent to 5% of max Health for 2 turns at the moment the caster is attacked. Can only be granted once every 2 turns.

arti_desc_en: The swing of his axe was unstoppable; his enemies becoming an ever-growing pile of corpses. Written by Reingar Media Club [Special Edition: Testimony of Ancient Weapons 6, 44p]

arti_base_en: Increases Critical Hit Chance of the caster by 5% after making a critical hit. Effect can only stack up to 3 times.

arti_desc_en: A powerful tonfa capable of smashing bones and splitting flesh. They say that when the wielders of this weapon die, their souls are bound to it.

arti_desc_en: Did you enjoy the world I showed you? Was it satisfying? Now, pay the price with your life.

arti_desc_en: A mandolin used by Ludo, a pure-voiced minstrel. If you play it, you can see an illusion of butterflies made of light dancing.

arti_desc_en: Look carefully at the smoke that rises from the pipe-you'll see within whether you're destined for paradise or hell.

arti_desc_en: A dark egg containing demonic energy. Nobody knows what it may contain inside.

arti_desc_en: They say that the ship held down with that anchor is able to endure all strong winds. - Written by Louis [The Adventures of Louis Van Vrista, pg. 51]

arti_desc_en: A totem deep within the forest. Make a wish before it, and if you a clear ringing bell, your wish will come true.

arti_desc_en: A key made in honor of the heroes who defeated the ancient monster, Nankuda, engraved with their oath to protect the world - Philosopher Izet

arti_base_kr: 명중이 10% 증가합니다.

arti_desc_en: It is said you can see into the future by lighting a candle, putting it on this candlestick, and looking into the flame.

arti_max_en: 40% chance to reduce cooldown by 1 turn at the moment the caster is attacked. Can only be activated once per turn.

arti_base_en: 20% chance to reduce cooldown by 1 turn at the moment the caster is attacked. Can only be activated once per turn.

arti_max_en: 100% chance to dispel one debuff from an ally at the beginning of the turn.

arti_base_en: 10% chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the turn. Can only be activated once per turn.

arti_desc_en: "Whether you take the path before you or not, it's all your choice to make," the White Shining Blade's voice whispered in my mind.

arti_desc_en: This rare magical flower blooms from the corpse of a Human who possessed incredible magic power. It quickly withers away unless it is constantly being infused with powerful Mana. Few have been lucky enough to witness such a sight.

arti_base_en: 25% chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn when attacking.

arti_desc_en: Once upon a time, a girl's parents asked a mage to transform their tomboyish daughter into an elegant lady. He fulfilled their request, and the parents were thrilled to see how obedient she had become, not realizing she had been replaced by a doll.

arti_desc_en: An ancient book written by a great mage. It contains all of Magaraha's magical research. Due to its complicated content and massive volume, even those ambitious enough to try to read it all had to give up after turning only a few pages.

arti_desc_en: A book written in the characters of the fallen Kingdom of Tagehel. Researchers are working hard to discover the meaning and principals behind the characters and unlock the mysterious power they hold.
arti_max_kr: 스테이지 시작 시 소울을 20 획득합니다.

arti_desc_en: While holding this gauntlet, you can destroy anything you touch, as if it had never even existed! - Guard Maid, El

arti_desc_en: That damn shield can't be penetrated by anything. I guarantee you, cause even my sword couldn't. - Star Fencer Ayla
